SELECT NO, LOT_ID, TESTER_MODEL, TESTER_NUMBER, TEST_MODE, OPERATER_ID, SUBSTR(SYS_DATE,1,4)||'-'||SUBSTR(SYS_DATE,5,2)||'-'||SUBSTR(SYS_DATE,7,2)||' '||SUBSTR(SYS_DATE,9,2)||':'||SUBSTR(SYS_DATE,11,2)||':'||SUBSTR(SYS_DATE,13,2) AS SYS_DATE, MESSAGE, H_STATUS_VALUE, OPER, MAT_ID, QTY, H_MSG_CODE, H_MSG, H_FIELD_MSG, H_DB_ERR_MSG, BOARD_ID, HEAD, OP_INPUT, CAT1, CAT2, CAT3, CAT4, CAT5, CAT6, CAT7, CAT8, CAT9, HOLD_FLAG, COMMAND FROM MES_TRACK_IN_OUT
1 = 1
AND SYS_DATE >= #{createDateStart}
AND SYS_DATE <= #{createDateEnd}
AND LOT_ID LIKE '%'|| #{lotId} || '%'
AND TEST_MODE LIKE '%'|| #{mesMode} || '%'
ORDER BY SYS_DATE DESC
